mapper.select: select Distinct p.category_small_id, cm.category_small_name from PRODUCTCONTAINER p join category_small cm on p.category_small_id = cm.category_small_id where product_display_name Like '%${searchWord}%'

SELECT DISTINCT b.brand_id, b.brand_name FROM brand b JOIN product_display pd ON b.brand_id = pd.brand_id JOIN product p ON pd.product_display_id = p.product_display_id JOIN category_small cs ON p.category_small_id = cs.category_small_id JOIN category_mid cm ON cm.category_mid_id = cs.category_mid_id where product_display_name Like '%${searchWord}%'
AND category_small_id = #{categorySmallId}
